com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.StatTracker

Class RunningStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.StatTracker.RunningStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RunningStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object that holds all statistics from a run. Most statistics are wrapped in a Datapoint. Created by hendrikdepauw on 07/03/2017.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRating

        public double getRating()
        Get the rating associated with this run
        Returns:
        rating of the run, -1 if no rating available

      • getLocation

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng getLocation(long time)
        This method retrieves the location at the latest time before @param time. In case there are no locations to return, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        time - in milliseconds since start of run
        Returns:
        LatLng object, null if no location found

      • getRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng> getRoute()
        This method retrieves the complete route from the run.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of LatLng objects that represents the route. The list is empty if no locations were present.

      • getSpeed

        public RunSpeed getSpeed(long time)
        This method retrieves the speed at the latest time before @param time.
        Parameters:
        time - in milliseconds since start of run
        Returns:
        RunSpeed object, contains 0 if no speed found.

      • getAverageSpeed

        public RunSpeed getAverageSpeed()
        This method calculates the average speed of the user. Zero order hold is used.
        Returns:
        RunSpeed object containing average speed

      • getHeartrate

        public RunHeartRate getHeartrate(long time)
        This method retrieves the heart rate at the latest time before @param time.
        Parameters:
        time - in milliseconds since start of run
        Returns:
        RunHeartRate object, contains 0 if no heart rate found

      • getAverageHeartRate

        public RunHeartRate getAverageHeartRate()
        This method calculates the average heart rate of the user. Zero order hold is used.
        Returns:
        RunSpeed object containing average speed

      • getDistance

        public RunDistance getDistance(long time)
        This method retrieves the distance at the latest time before @param time.
        Parameters:
        time - in milliseconds since start of run
        Returns:
        RunDistance object, contains 0 if no distance found

      • getTotalDistance

        public RunDistance getTotalDistance()
        This method retrieves the total distance of the run, being the last RunDistance object of the run.
        Returns:
        RunDistance object, 0 if no distance found

      • getRunDuration

        public RunDuration getRunDuration()
        Returns:
        RunDuration object with total duration of the run

      • getStartTimeMillis

        public long getStartTimeMillis()
        Returns:
        long with the startTime of the run in milliseconds since 1970

      • includePause

        public void includePause(long pauseLengthMillis)
        Reset the starttime of the run. Should be called when resuming the run. This makes sure the run seems like one smooth run without breaks

      • getStartTimeDate

        public java.lang.String getStartTimeDate()
        This method formats the startime of the run to a readable string. Format of string: DayOfTheWeek, DayOfTheMonth MonthName Year
        Returns:
        String containing starttime
